defaultValue: Toggle specific functionality of Stellar Networks.

fieldDescription: Enable commodity board (buy, sell, and profit tabs).
Enable contacts board (contact list and remote calls) functionality.
Enable exploration board (managing intel in Exploration tab) functionality. Best consumed with Captains Log enabled.
Enable market query and market viewer functionality.
Enable storage board (search for cargo and view storage content and location) functionality.
Uninstall Stellar Networks during next save. Makes it possible to disable the mod and still continue the playthrough. Usually required when updating to a non-bugfix version.

This plugin will periodically 'visit' a market triggering, if needed, a cargo, ship, and staff refresh. Only runs when the campaign is in a paused state (either by the player, or by the game itself - like showing interaction dialogues). Has negligible game performance effect. Suggested to keep it on for smoother gameplay if you use market functionality.
Allow remotely calling Sebestyen, who is a hidden contact (does not show in a Contact intel).
When enabled, market queries will show results from Open Markets.
When enabled, market queries will show results from Military Markets.
When enabled, market queries will show results from Black Markets.
When enabled, market queries will show results from custom (e.g. modded) markets.
When enabled, market queries will show results from Open Markets.
When enabled, market queries will show results from Military Markets.
When enabled, market queries will show results from Black Markets.
When enabled, market queries will show results from custom (e.g. modded) markets.
